import React, {useState} from "react"; // import FormGroup from "@mui/material/FormGroup"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; // import * as Yup from 'yup'; import FormControl from "@mui/material/FormControl"; import FormLabel from "@mui/material/FormLabel"; import Select from "@mui/material/Select"; import InputLabel from "@mui/material/InputLabel"; import { Avatar } from "@material-ui/core"; import { useHistory, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import MenuItem from "@mui/material/MenuItem"; import { Tab, Tabs, TabList, TabPanel } from "react-tabs"; import "react-tabs/style/react-tabs.css"; import StateData from "../../Util/States.json"; import { toast, ToastContainer } from "react-toastify"; import { db } from "../../Util/firebase"; import { collection, getDocs, addDoc, updateDoc, doc, deleteDoc, } from "firebase/firestore"; import { SettingsInputAntennaTwoTone } from "@material-ui/icons"; // import { useHistory } from "react-router"; // import Toaster from '../../Util/Toaster'; // import { ReactComponent as WalletSvg } from '../../Assets/svg/wallet.svg'; // Component Imports // import { AccountSummary } from '../Pages/NewLoan/AccountSummary'; const NewLoan = () => { const initialState = { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", applicationFor: "", gender: "", dob: "", maritalStatus: "", occupation: "", yearsToRetirement: "", indebtedToBank: false, country: "Nigeria", stateOfOrigin: "", integrity: 0, lga: "", city: "", street: "", stateOfResidence: "", altPhone: "", primaryPhone: "", idType: "", idNumber: "", idExpiryDate: "", employerName: "", address: { street: "", city: "", state: "", loanType: "", loanAmount: 0, collateral: "", numberOfRepayments: "", interest: "15%", maxRepayablePeriod: "", additionalInfo: "", accountName: "", accountNumber: "", banker: "", checkNumber: "", salary: 0, }, } const [state, setState] = useState(initialState); const [data, setData] = useState({}); const history = useHistory(); const { firstName, lastName, email, gender, dob, maritalStatus, occupation, yearsToRetirement, indebtedToBank, country, stateOfOrigin, lga, city, street, stateOfResidence, altPhone, primaryPhone, idType, idNumber, idExpiryDate, loanType, loanAmount, collateral, numberOfRepayments, interest, maxRepayablePeriod, additionalInfo, accountName, accountNumber, banker, checkNumber, salary, employerName, address, integrity, rcity, rstate, guarantorName, gEmail, phone, officeId, gyearsToRetirement, colleague} = state; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const {name, value } = e.target; setState({ ...state, [name]: value }); } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); db.child("borrower").push(state, (err) => { if (err) { toast.error(err); }else { toast.success("Borrower added successfully"); } }); setTimeout(() => history.push("/app/loans"), 500); } // const borrowersCollectionRef = collection(db, "Ahz9S14ABTlH8AL1lTDF"); // const createLoan = async () => { // await addDoc(borrowersCollectionRef, bankInfo) // console.log(bankInfo);
